Name: Maestro VR
About the game: Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Use the movements of your hands to lead the orchestra playing musical works by the greatest composers in history. Unique experience where you will lead the musicians in a concert hall. Features Become a conductor in virtual reality. Use your hands to follow the beat, dynamics, ensure correct entries by ensemble members. Symphony Orchestra positioned in 3D spatialized sound. Earn titles by gaining experience to get more audience at your concerts. Unlock Batons with skills. Conduct musical pieces from different eras. High precision realistic patterns. Load MIDI files to customize your orchestra and conduct your own pieces of music with your hands. Share your MIDI files on the Steam Workshop.
